title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 94.7 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 94.7 - Applicability

State Regulations

Nothing contained herein shall
(a) prohibit a supplier or a licensed beer
wholesaler from conducting any sales contest, promotion or other incentive
program, plan or arrangement, for its own employees or
(b) permit payments or reimbursements to be
made by a supplier to a licensed beer wholesaler for display work, "stock boy"
services or similar activities performed on behalf of such supplier or its
products by such licensed beer wholesaler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
94.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
